form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO EXTEND TEMPORARY STAY IN THE UNITED STATES, 4-199-4

full_text: Screened by NARA, 2/10/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved IMMIGRATION AND NAHURALIZ NASERVICE Budget Bureau No. 43 - R0068 PRITACTION TO EXTEND STAY 18 AM 11:03 FEE STAMP TIME OF TEMPORARY $ 10 00 FEE PAID No. POO. 71 Immigration and Naturalization S91-19 I HEREBY APPLIATO EXTEND MY TEMPORARY STAY IN Portland, Oregon M&F THE UNITED STATES _j AM 9:04 Date 3/18/71 Vorified by LAB 1 FAMILY NAME (Capital Letters) FIRST NAME MIDDLE NAME FILE NUMBER 7. DATE TO WHICH EXTENSION is REQUESTED NGUYEN Nhat Thi December 1971 2. OTHER NAMES (Include all past and present names; married woman must give her maiden name) 8 REASON FOR COMING TO THE UNITED STATES Visit daughter & son-in-law 3 MAILING ADDRESS IN U S (Number and Street) (City) (State) (Zip Code) SLB 2173 - 16th Ave. W. Eugene,Oregon 97402 CHECK 4. DATE OF BIRTH (Mo. . Day . Yr) COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF CITIZENSHIP 9. REASON FOR REQUESTING TENSION 1906 VietNam VietNam Stay with who 5. NONIMMIGRANT CLASSIFICATION DATE ON WHICH AUTHORIZED STAY EXPIRES is sick B/2 April 17, 1971 6. DATE AND PORT OF LAST ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES NAME OF VESSEL AIRLINE OR OTHER MEANS OF 10. DATE OF INTENDED DEPARTURE FROM U.S. LAST ARRIVAL IN U.S Honolulu, Hawaii PA 842 December 1971 FOR GOVERNMENT USE ONLY U. S APPROVED INS. 11. NAME OF VESSEL AIRLINE OR OTHER INTENDED MEANS OF DEPARTURE FROM U.S. EXTENSION GRANTED TO (Date) DATE PA OF out.17,1971 ACTION MAR 22 1971 12. PORT OF INTENDED DEPARTURE FROM U.S. DD EXTENSION DENIED V.D. TO (Date) OR San Francisco OIC Wm. L. Pauillo 13. I AM AM NOT IN OFFICE HB POSSESSION OF A TRANSPORTA TION TICKET FOR MY DEPARTURE PORTLAND OREGON 14. PASSPORT NUMBER PASSPORT ISSUED BY (Country) PASSPORT EXPIRES ON (Date) 15. Number, Street, City, Province (State) and Country of Permanent Residence 020124/69 VietNam Dec. 1971 177/1 Le Van Duyet, Saigon, VN 16. I AM AM NOT married. If you wish to apply for extension for any of your nonimmigrant children, give the following: (See Instruction #1) NAMES OF CHILDREN DATE OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF BIRTH PASSPORT ISSUED BY (Country) AND EXPIRES ON (Date) IF SPOUSE HAS ALSO SUBMITTED APPLICATION OR EXTENSION GIVE NAME OF SPOUSE NOTE: If children for whom you are seeking extension do For Statistics on Adjudications not reside with you, give their complete address on a separate attachment to this application. gived 17. OCCUPATION Tr. In Ret'd. - Tr. Out SOCIAL SECURITY NUMBER (If none, state "none") Completed 19. (Insert "Have" or "Have Not") I have not BEEN EMPLOYED OR ENGAGED IN BUSINESS IN THE UNITED STATES. IF YOU HAVE BEEN EMPLOYED OR ENGAGED IN BUSINESS IN THE UNITED STATES, COMPLETE THE REST OF THE BLOCK. NAME AND ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER OR BUSINESS KIND OF EMPLOYMENT OR BUSINESS INCOME PER WEEK DATES SUCH EMPLOYMENT OR BUSINESS BEGAN AND ENDED 20. MEANS AND SOURCE OF SUPPORT WHILE IN THE UNITED STATES My own 21. I AM VISITING THE FOLLOWING PERSONS IN THE UNITED STATES NAME RELATIONSHIP ADDRESS See attached letter 22. I ATTACH WRITTEN STATEMENT FROM James McGeever DATED March 17, 1971 IN SUPPORT OF THIS APPLICATION. I BELIEVE SUCH STATEMENT TO BE TRUE AND I MAKE IT PART OF THIS APPLICATION. (See Instruction 6.) I CERTIFY THAT THE ABOVE IS TRUE AND CORRECT SIGNATURE OF PERSON PREPARING FORM IF OTHER THAN APPLICANT SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT I DECLARE THAT THIS DOCUMENT WAS PREPARED BY ME AT THE REQUEST OF THE APPLICANT AND IS BASED ON ALL INFORMATION OF WHICH I HAVE ANY KNOWLEDGE. DATE SIGNATURE March 17, 1971 Mcgeever CITY AND STATE ADDRESS DATE Eugene, Oregon 2173 - 16th Ave. W. 3/17/71 FORM I-539 (REV. 1-1-70)
